item.description:
Something I'd like to check out - visit the flower fields at Long Hill and catch the last possible blossoms. There is a short (1.2 mile) trail to walk as well - if we have some fine fall weather, this should be fun. Then of course we can go find some refreshments nearby. Suggestions welcome -
Not Your Average Joe's on Enon St is good, or for something different and healthy, there is the Organic Garden Cafe on Cabot St. Open to suggestions! I will update the meetup based on what I hear from you!

http://www.thetrustee...

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Pick Your Own Flowers at Long Hill
